## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm really interested in learning more about Verus and its capabilities. Can you tell me about the key features and benefits of launching a blockchain using Verus, and how can users create their own tokens or blockchains without needing to program?

**AI Assistant:**
Launching a blockchain using Verus is a powerful way to create a customizable, interoperable, and independent blockchain with a range of features. Here are some of the key benefits and features of launching a blockchain using Verus:

**L1 Features:**
Verus blockchains come with a range of L1 features, including:

* **L1 Multi-currency**: Consensus layer basket currencies, simple token currencies, and decentralized crowdfund mechanisms.
* **L1 DeFi**: Consensus layer Automated Market Makers (AMMs), MEV-free, no front/back-running, and fully decentralized marketplace.
* **L1 VerusID**: Consensus layer self-sovereign identities, namespace for currencies, tokens, and PBaaS-blockchains, friendly-name addresses, revocable, recoverable, NFTs, profiles, and binding to any type of data.
* **L1 Privacy**: Consensus layer zk-SNARKs privacy technology.

**Security and Performance:**
Verus blockchains are designed to be secure and high-performance, with:

* **51% hash attack resistance**: 50% proof-of-work, 50% proof-of-stake, making them resistant to 51% hash attacks.
* **High performance**: 75-800 transactions per second (TPS), with adjustable block times from 10 seconds to 2 minutes.

**Scalability:**
Verus blockchains can scale out by deploying more interoperable, interconnected PBaaS-chains.

**Launch without Programming:**
One of the key benefits of Verus is that users can launch their own tokens or blockchains without needing to program. This is made possible by the VerusID system, which enables any user to create their own token currency or full-fledged blockchain. The cost of launching a PBaaS-chain is 10,000 VRSC, which is split between the Verus block producers and the block producers of the newly launched chain.

Overall, Verus provides a powerful and flexible platform for launching customizable, interoperable, and independent blockchains, with a range of features and benefits that make it an attractive option for users.

# Introduction
Launch blockchains that are ✅ **fully interoperable**, ✅ **customizable** and ✅ **independent**. Each blockchain launched has the following L1 features.| Feature | Details | 
| :-----| :------ | 
| [L1 Multi-currency](/currencies/) | Consensus layer basket currencies (e.g. liquidity pools) & simple token currencies, decentralized crowdfund mechanisms |
| [L1 DeFi](/sendcurrency/) | Consensus layer AMMs, MEV-free, no front/back-running, solving all conversions simultaneously within a block & fully decentralized marketplace | 
| [L1 VerusID](/verusid/) | Consensus layer self-sovereign identities, namespace for currencies, tokens & PBaaS-blockchains, friendly-name addresses, revocable, recoverable, NFTs, profiles, can be bound to any type of data | 
| L1 Privacy | Consensus layer zk-SNARKs privacy technology |
| 51% hash attack resistant | 50% proof-of-work, 50% proof-of-stake. [Read the paper here.](https://verus.io/papers/VerusPoP.pdf) |
| 75 - 800 TPS | High performance blockchain, adjustable block times 10 secs - 2 mins |
| Scaling | Scale out by deploying more interoperable, interconnected PBaaS-chains |It costs 10,000 VRSC to launch a PBaaS-chain. 5000 goes to the Verus block producers, 5000 goes to the block producers of the newly launched chain.## Launch without programming needed
Enables any user with VerusID to create their own token currency or even full fledged, multi-currency, VerusID-issuing 50% PoW/50% PoS, [51% hash attack resistant](https://verus.io/papers/VerusPoP.pdf) blockchain that can send and receive from the Verus chain which launched it.
